languages.text: А чего? Наш командир сказал: "Влага закаляет дух".

traits.locale_text: А чего? Наш командир сказал: "Влага закаляет дух".

languages.text: "Кому-то везет еще меньше. Слышал, мутанты с привязи сорвались? Не повезло бедолагам, кто рядом оказался".
"Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."
languages.original_text: "Кому-то везет еще меньше. Слышал, мутанты с привязи сорвались? Не повезло бедолагам, кто рядом оказался".

traits.locale_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."
"Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."
"Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."
"Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."
"Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

languages.text: "Manche Leute haben noch weniger Glück. Habt Ihr gehört, dass die Mutanten sich losgerissen haben? Pech für die armen Seelen, die in der Nähe waren."
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: "Manche Leute haben noch weniger Glück. Habt Ihr gehört, dass die Mutanten sich losgerissen haben? Pech für die armen Seelen, die in der Nähe waren."

languages.text: « D'autres sont encore plus à plaindre que nous. Tu es au courant, pour les mutants qui se sont rebiffés ? Malheur à ceux qui se trouvaient dans les parages à ce moment-là. »
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: « D'autres sont encore plus à plaindre que nous. Tu es au courant, pour les mutants qui se sont rebiffés ? Malheur à ceux qui se trouvaient dans les parages à ce moment-là. »

languages.text: “有些人比你还倒霉呢。你听说变种人暴动的事情了吗？现场那些人可真够倒霉的。”
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: “有些人比你还倒霉呢。你听说变种人暴动的事情了吗？现场那些人可真够倒霉的。”

languages.text: «Hay quien está peor. ¿Has oído que los mutantes escaparon de sus correas? Los pobres que andaban por allí sí que tuvieron mala suerte».
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: «Hay quien está peor. ¿Has oído que los mutantes escaparon de sus correas? Los pobres que andaban por allí sí que tuvieron mala suerte».

languages.text: 「世の中にはもっと運の悪い連中もいる。変異体どもの鎖が解き放たれたらしいぞ？近くにいたかわいそうな連中にとっちゃ災難だったろうよ」
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: 「世の中にはもっと運の悪い連中もいる。変異体どもの鎖が解き放たれたらしいぞ？近くにいたかわいそうな連中にとっちゃ災難だったろうよ」

languages.text: "Daha şanssızları da var. Şu serbest kalan mutantlardan haberin var mı? Yakınlardaki zavallılar için büyük talihsizlik."
languages.original_text: "Some people are even less lucky. Did you hear the mutants got off their leash? Bad luck for the poor sods who were nearby."

traits.locale_text: "Daha şanssızları da var. Şu serbest kalan mutantlardan haberin var mı? Yakınlardaki zavallılar için büyük talihsizlik."
